Articles.Content:
I'm going to ask the community to weigh in on this, because it may be my not so spectacular hardware...

I've noticed two "bugs" in the sounds.

#1 - Multiple inflight explosions (boosters colliding after they are jettisoned) "sputter" - it's not distorted, just choppy, as if the game is trying to play more sounds at once then my system can handle.

#2 - While in the "Space Center" scene, by which I mean you are looking down on the entire KSC, you can heard ambient noise and birds chirping. After a short time, they suddenly stop - almost as if a sound that was meant to loop isn't looping. (NEVERmind, seems have corrected it's self)

Video of #1:
